EventOFF.description: The event to fire when deactivated: 0:No event 1:Open 2:Close 3:Kill 4:Generate 5:Get_off 6:On 7:Off 8:Attack 9:Attack_Ready 10:Can't_Attack

EventON.description: The event to fire when activated. Events continued: 11:Return 12:Destroy 13:Start_Moving 14:Reset 15:Rise 16:Descent 17:Start 18:Invert 19:Clear

Type.description: Behavior for the switch: 0 - Remain on 1- Remain on while weighed down 2 - Turn off after time expires

Extra.name: A small switch which activates an event once pressed.
